#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	for(int k=1;k<=t;k++)
	{
		cin>>s;
		int l=s.length();
		char temp=s[l-1];
		int end=l-1;
		int ans=0;
		int beg;
		for(int i=end-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			if(s[i]==temp)
			{
				beg=i;
				while(s[beg]==s[end])
				{
					beg--;
					end--;
				}
				if(beg==-1)
				ans=max(ans,l-1-end);
				end=l-1;
			}
		}
		if(ans==0)
		cout<<"Case "<<k<<": -1"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"Case "<<k<<": "<<ans<<endl;
		
	}
}
